description: This file contains pytest-based integration tests for the FireCrawlKnowledgeBase component within the agno project. It tests loading URLs into the knowledge base, both synchronously and asynchronously, and verifies interactions with the LanceDb vector database and the Agent component.

methods.name: setup_vector_db
methods.description: Fixture that sets up a temporary LanceDb instance for testing, generating a unique table name and cleaning up after tests.

methods.name: test_firecrawl_knowledge_base_directory
methods.description: Tests loading multiple URLs into the FireCrawlKnowledgeBase and verifies the search functionality via the Agent.

methods.name: test_firecrawl_knowledge_base_single_url
methods.description: Tests loading a single URL into the knowledge base and verifies the search functionality.

methods.name: test_firecrawl_knowledge_base_async_directory
methods.description: Asynchronous test for loading multiple URLs and verifying the vector database's count.

methods.name: test_firecrawl_knowledge_base_async_single_url
methods.description: Asynchronous test for loading a single URL and verifying the vector database's count.

methods.name: test_firecrawl_knowledge_base_empty_urls
methods.description: Tests behavior when loading an empty URL list into the knowledge base.
